name: the wattle stitch one
notes:
**buy any 2 patterns and get 30% off**

available from [lullaby lodge designs][1]

the wattle stitch one

**pattern description**: unlock the beauty of the wattle stitch with this easy and versatile dishcloth pattern! perfect for beginners and seasoned crocheters alike, this tutorial will guide you through the delightful texture of the wattle stitch, resulting in a practical and attractive dishcloth. this pattern is ideal for adding a handmade touch to your kitchen or for gifting to friends and family.

**materials needed**:
- worsted, dk or fingering weight cotton yarn
- 3, 4 or 5mm crochet hook
- tapestry needle for weaving in ends
- scissors

**skills required**:
- chain (ch)
- single crochet (sc)
- double crochet (dc)
- slip stitch (sl st)

a [video tutorial][2] is available for visual learners.

**join our community**: we invite you to join the [lullaby lodge designs ravelry group][3] for more crochet patterns, tips, and a supportive community of fellow crafters. share your finished dishcloths and connect with others who love crocheting as much as you do!
